Author: ablalb
Text: It’s definitely hard to not blame myself since I catalyzed the fight but I’m not blaming myself for being “manipulative.” Thank you for the kind wishes! You be safe and sweet to yourself as well!

Author: karentakethekids
Text: Really sad to hear this, i hope you are not blaming yourself for this. Sometimes people just dont understand EDs. Honestly my ED has ruined a ton of relationships n will continue to do so unless i recover Anyways, stay save n dont b too harsh on urself.
